Customization¶

Note

Also HTML [1]. See Output Formats for more details on the output formats.

Footnotes

[1]Please note that any format that involves HTML output is based on templates which need to be defined in the LOKP Customization and its exact form may therefore vary. See LOKP Customization for more details.
